meanings.definition: The reproductive organs, especially the external sex organs.
meanings.sent1: She felt embarrassed when her dog sniffed her genitals in public.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined his genitals during the routine check-up.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his genitals had a mind of their own during the awkward date.
meanings.sent4: The artist depicted the city skyline as a maze of towering genitals in his abstract painting.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the flowers was so strong, it reminded her of the scent of her own genitals.

meanings.definition: The sexual organs of a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper carefully checked the genitals of the new baby elephant.
meanings.sent2: She blushed when her partner complimented her genitals during intimacy.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue hidden in the suspect's genitals, leading to a breakthrough in the case.
meanings.sent4: The politician's speech was full of lies, making his words as deceptive as his own genitals.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm outside matched the intensity of their passion, causing their genitals to tingle with excitement.
